text:
So we support <webapp> in the nested elements of this task, and we handle it in
jasperc adapter, but we dont have the support in Jspc.Java to bind the two.

Fixing this makes too many changes to jspc to be snuck in at the last minute.
Well, not many changes but its the testing and regression risk that scares me.
creator: stevel@apache.org

text: fixed in cvs_head, not in 1.5.x branch though
